title: Oprah Winfrey explores faith and spirituality in 'Belief'
text:
> Entertainment Oprah Winfrey explores faith and spirituality in 'Belief' Ava DuVernay attends the premiere of the Oprah Winfrey Network's (OWN) documentary series "Belief", at The TimesCenter on Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015, in New York. (Photo by Greg Allen/Invision/AP) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
